what_is_hivegame.question: What is hivegame.com?
what_is_hivegame.answer: hivegame.com is a community effort to create a new online platform to play Hive¬Æ for free. hivegame.com is ad-free, open source, developed by members of the community, and officially supported by the creator of Hive¬Æ John Yianni.

how_to_help.question: How can I help this project thrive?

answers.item1: You can help us by contributing to the <source_link>code base.</source_link>
answers.item2: You can support us with ideas, feedback, and graphics check on <discord_link>Discord</discord_link>
answers.item3: You can keep the lights on with a <donate_link>donation.</donate_link> And once the lights are always on, your donation helps keeping the developers' lights on.

how_does_it_operate.question: How does hivegame.com operate?
how_does_it_operate.answer: It's developed by communtity members, and 100% donation based. hivegame.com will never collect any user data, show ads or implement anything else that will distract you from the game or makes money.

what_is_hive.question: What is Hive?
what_is_hive.answer: Hive is an award-winning abstract strategy game designed by John Yianni in 2000 and published by <gen42_link></gen42_link>.

how_to_play_with_friends.question: Can I set up a game with a friend?

answers.item1: Yes, you can create a game by clicking on the 'create a game' button of the main page, then select the ‚Äòprivate‚Äô option and afterwards share the link with a friend. They will need to have/create account to play.
answers.item2: Alternatively, you can send a direct challenge by using the 'crossed swords' icon next to each user, that will send a direct challenge to that specific user.
answers.item3: Of course, you can also set up an open challenge that can be accepted by anyone in the Elo range criteria and just hope they are first to accept your game.

how_to_check_stack.question: How can I see what is under a piece?

answers.item1: On mobile, longpress on the stack to expand it. After it is expanded, you can move your finger out of the screen to see the lowest piece as well.
answers.item2: On desktop, right click on the stack and it will stay expanded until you let go.

what_are_cornfirmation_modes.question: What do the different confirmation modes mean?
what_are_cornfirmation_modes.description: When making a move there are 3 modes:

answers.item1: Double click - The default one, the first click places the piece and the second click makes the move.
answers.item2: Single click - The fast one, if you want to not lose time in fast games. Careful not to misplace because the one and only click immediately makes the move.
answers.item3: Clock confirm - The secure one, if you want to avoind making moves by mistake. First click where to place/move and then to confirm and make the move you have to click on your own timer.

can_i_play_base_game.question: Can I play the base game without expansions?
can_i_play_base_game.answer: Yes, but why would you? Bad joke aside, the base game is restricted to untraded play. Hive PLM (all three expansions: Pillbug, Ladybug, Mosquito) is the offical format used in tournaments. It's also the most challenging and fun!

what_rating_system.question: What rating system does hivegame.com use?
what_rating_system.answer: We use the <glicko2_link></glicko2_link> system. Parameterized like Lichess.

how_to_recover_password.question: What can I do if I forgot my password?
how_to_recover_password.answer: We don't have automatic password recovery yet, you can contact us via Discord @klautcomputing / @ionoi and ask us to reset your password.

why_basic_chat.question: Why is chat so basic?
why_basic_chat.details: The chat feature is very much a work in progress, we are aware it has issues, important things to keep in mind when using it:

answers.item1: Currently the chat is not persisted in the database so whenever we deploy an update your chat messages will be lost!
answers.item2: For now it is only possible to chat in a game (direct messages and other ways will be added), spectators don't see the player chat nor do the players see the spectator chat.
answers.item3: Sometimes the red chat notification will show new messages when there aren't any.

opponent_is_abusive.question: What can I do if my opponent is abusive or disruptive in game/chat or has an inappropriate username, what can I do?
opponent_is_abusive.answer: Screenshot the behaviour and contact us via Discord @klautcomputing / @ionoi we will sort it out.

where_to_meet_other_players.question: Where can I get to know the rest of the community playing Hive¬Æ all around the world?
where_to_meet_other_players.answer: Find the links to our social media <resources_link>here</resources_link>. The Hive¬Æ community is very friendly and you will surely find someone close to you to play face to face as well!

why_elo_has_questionmark.question: Why does my elo have a ‚Äú?‚Äù behind it?
why_elo_has_questionmark.answer: This happens while your elo is still uncertain. It goes away once you have played enough games and once the ? is gone you can also show up on the leaderboards.

why_not_in_top_players.question: Why do I not show up in the top ranked players?
why_not_in_top_players.answer: You haven‚Äôt played enough games yet for the system to be really sure how accurate your rating is. Just keep playing a couple games more, hopefully win them and you will show up.

how_to_review_games.question: Can I review finished games with an analysis tool?
how_to_review_games.answer: Yes, finished games have a microscope icon that will load the game into analysis mode but this feature is currently under development, so don‚Äôt expect too much yet.

where_to_learn_more.question: How can I learn more about the strategy of Hive?
where_to_learn_more.answer: We are planning on adding an interactive tutorial to help you learn and understand all the strategic ideas behind the game, in the future check the <resources_link>resources</resources_link> section for books, videos and the discord!

can_i_set_up_a_tournament.question: Can I set up a tournament?
can_i_set_up_a_tournament.answer: Yes though we are still working on it. You can contact us via Discord if you want to help us out.

can_i_play_with_bots.question: Can I play against a bot?
can_i_play_with_bots.answer: This feature is not supported yet, but it could be soon (get in contact with us if you want to help code this).
